Posts.Content: Dec 8, 2013 07:57PM schubemj wrote: I am posting for my wife.  We are currently suffering our 4th setback and starting a new set of chemotherapy. As with many of you my wife's journey is too long to tell in brief.  I see everyone lists the therapies and other details of their conditions.  Is there a format to it or just list them and you format it?  I also do not see many husbands involved in these discussion groups or social media postings.  Am I just missing it or is it just taboo? I will post more later.
Posts.Title: How Many Are We? DivineMrsM kt1966
